headline: About Me
paragraphs: I’m Will — a software engineer and a wannabe entrepreneur. I started Leumas Tech just to put my logo on gadgets and tools, but along the way I found out I actually love building stuff.
Programming became my lane, especially with Node.js. I like keeping things modular, fast, and clean so whatever I make can grow or plug into something bigger later.
At the core, I just like turning ideas into working systems. Doesn’t matter if it’s a small script, a full app, or a whole framework — if it works and it’s useful, that’s a win.
